name: The Slime Element
description:
Build up you defense and fight against waves of slime monsters in this 3D fantasy tower defense game. Use wide variety of unique towers, magic or just your surrounding do stop the monsters from entering your portal.

This game is in early-access mode for testing. Any feedback, either from survey (found in game) or other social platforms, will be greatly appreciated.

Note:

           - play with english/czech keyboard layout, or some buttons won't work.
